result.execSummary:
The defendant Randall James Arndt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Randall James Arndt is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Randall James Arndt was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Subject to Work Release.

May not hold elected office.

Other rights could be lost until restored.

Compas and follow requirements.
Can apply for early discharge.

CASES: 14CF77, 14CF270, 14CF299, 14CF318, 14CF322, 14TR2092 & 14TR2093. Defendant Randall James Arndt in court with attorney Daniel James Chapman.  Defendant Randall James Arndt in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 9:42 am.  
14CF299-CT grants waiver of PH, Information to be filed, repeater to be stricken, must be filed w/in 1 week.  CT finds PC, def bound over.  

14CF318-Count 1, repeater stricken-guilty. CT-adj guilty, judgment entered.
14CF299-Count 2, no repeater-guilty.  CT adj guilty.  All other counts/files are dismissed.  CT finds waiver of PSI.
No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, no body armor, if not US citizen face deportation or lose other citizenship rights, other rights could be lost until restored.  
SENTENCE:  6 mo PCJ on ea, concurrent-both withheld, probation up to 2 yrs.  
14CF318-impose 60 days CT, banked for probation.  COMPAS & follow requirements, can apply for early discharge.  
Waive fine portion.  On ea DNA surcharge of $250.  DNA Sample.  $114.50 costs on each.  Bond to be applied & remainder to be returned to poster.  71 days credit if revoked.  Subj to WR & GT.  PCR.  Must signup w/ probation today.  10:17 am adj.

**Conversation with judge - each sentenced is Imposed/Stayed not w/held sentence.  KRB**
